General.Text: Press {Y} anytime if the RIOT is stuck.
Get the ~HC_3~~h~cash suitcase~h~~s~ from the back of the ~r~~h~money truck~h~~s~.
Bring the case into the bank.
Press ~y~~h~End~h~~s~ anytime to end the callout.

Guard.Dialogue: Hello Officer! Thanks for coming! We have a very important delivery!
The armoured bank truck will deliver a big amount of money to our destination.
The truck will be driven by you, a armoured swat vehicle will follow.
We got reports that an attack might be happening, that's why we have you and the swat team. Let's go!

Bankman.Dialogue: Hello! I see you made it out alive! Now you know why we hire professionals like you, not like ... my colleagues.
... definitely. At least the swat vehicle is bullet proof.
The money truck is armoured, too. Only the windows are not.
Perfect, thank you, I put in a good word for you!
I hope the risk was worth it, have a nice day!
